paragraphs.name: b80f
paragraphs.text: Never, ever, waste your reader’s time. You’d only be wasting yours.

Dump out those passive verbs (e.g. is/be/are/has) for action verbs.
 Instead of: I was inspired by her work ethics. 
 Say: Her work ethics inspired me.
paragraphs.name: b915
90c8
paragraphs.text: Get Grammarly and save yourself from the harsh remarks of grammar Nazis. It’ll auto-highlight your grammar & spelling mistakes as soon you hit space or enter.
On point.
